set.name: Food
set.filler: It's so beautifully arranged on the plate you just know someone's fingers have been all over it. - Julia Child
An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day. - Irv Kupcinet
Mincing your words makes it easier if you have to eat them later. - Franklin P. Jones
Man does not live by words alone, despite the fact that sometimes he has to eat them. - Adlai Stevenson

set.name: Gardening
set.filler: True friendship is a plant of slow growth. - George Washington
The fragrance always stays in the hand that gives the rose. - Hada Bejar
Why not go out on a limb? Isn't that where the fruit is? - Frank Scully
Good thoughts bear good fruit, bad thoughts bear bad fruit and man is his own gardener. - James Allen

set.name: In The Kitchen
set.filler: To remove the core from a head of lettuce, hit the core end once against the counter sharply. The core will loosen and pull out easily.
Lettuce and celery keep longer if you store them in paper bags instead of cellophane.

set.name: Inspirational
set.filler: Heaven means to be one with God. - Confucius
God gave you a gift of 86,000 seconds today. Have you used one to say "thank you?" - William A. Ward
No man can be called friendless when he has God and the companionship of good books. - Elizabeth Barrett Browning
In prayer it is better to have a heart without words that words without a heart. - John Bunyan

set.name: Kids
set.filler: Adults are obsolete children. - Dr. Seuss
I have never let my schooling interfere with my education. - Mark Twain
Parents can plant magic in a child's mind through certain words spoken with some thrilling quality of voice, some uplift of the heart and spirit. - Robert MacNeil
Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know. Daniel J. Boorstin

set.name: Patriotic
set.filler: America did not invent human rights. In a very real sense human rights invented America. - Jimmy Carter
Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity. - Gen. George S. Patton Jr.
Leadership is a potent combination of strategy and character. But if you must be without one, be without strategy. - Gen. H. Norman Schwarzkopf
Patriotism is not a short frenzied burst of emotion, but the long and steady dedication of a lifetime. - Thomas Jefferson

set.name: Religious
set.filler: From where shall my help come? My help comes from the LORD, who made heaven and earth. - Psalm 121:1a, 2
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. - Psalm 23:1
To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven. - Ecclesiastes 3:1
Come unto me, all ye that labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. - Matthew 11:28

set.name: Custom
set.filler: The fillers you submit will be placed on the pages as indicated in your proof.
